name: Market Network Exchange (MNX)
tag_list: market-network-exchange, mnx, collaborate, social, marketplace, connect, share, barter, transact, exchange, software
overview:
MNX is a hybrid platform designed for group purchasing and collaborating in a social marketplace. Changing the way businesses and suppliers manage, connect and transact.

Here at MNX, we have been analyzing current market purchasing strategies, processes and methods and have found tremendous room for improvement. We have identified deficiencies with the help of our friends who span Wall Street sourcing executives, financial servicemen, small/medium business owners, lawyers, accountants, economists and engineers. We developed a web platform that reduces bureaucracy and red tape while maintaining governance. The root of our platform is:

A revolutionary Purchase Order Management system that works in sync with a Automated group purchase order system and is connected to a workflow/project management system.

In other words, we have combined the simplicity, selling network and market access of eBay… with the social, community and collaborative orientation of Facebook… and the enterprise solutions of SAP.

Secondly, the MNX platform is available in different formats to fit enterprise, small/medium business, hospitals, health facilities, schools and universities, charities and non-profits.

We are hosted in the cloud, mobile and state of the art. This is one of those platforms that will blow your mind. What can be achieved with MNX is your story to tell!
